detail_desc: Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Checked tights with an elasticated waist and a reinforced toe section. 40 denier.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Side pockets, back pockets and a pocket on one leg.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs. Side pockets, back pockets and a pocket on one leg.
Short, fitted cold shoulder dress in a patterned weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
Straight-cut jacket in a striped cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, jetted front pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. No fasteners. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft viscose jersey. Seam at the waist with a draped knot detail and a circular skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft viscose jersey. Seam at the waist with a draped knot detail and a circular skirt. Unlined.
Swimming goggles with plastic frames, tinted lenses and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with flounces down the front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Straight-style Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.

Straight-style Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.

Long dress in mesh with an embroidered pattern, a small frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Half-lined.
Short, wide shorts in a crinkled weave with a high waist with pleats and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Sleeveless satin top with a draped neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless satin top with a draped neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets, and heart-shaped patches on the knees. Soft cotton jersey lining in a contrasting colour.
Jumper in a soft knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Strapless, velour bandeau bikini top with a tie detail at the front and lined, lightly padded cups that shape the bust. Concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and a fastener at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Low-waisted bikini bottoms in velour with a glittery elastic waistband, narrow sides and a high-cut back. Lined.

Soft body in lace and mesh with lace cap sleeves and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a high cut at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Soft body in lace and mesh with lace cap sleeves and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a high cut at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Pyjamas in a cool, patterned viscose weave with piping. Shirt with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Boots in imitation suede with a knee-high, lined shaft, adjustable tab with metal buckle and elastication at the top of the shaft, a zip below and fabric lining. Chunky sole. Heel 3 cm.

Long dress in softly draping satin with short, flounced sleeves and an opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt with gathers and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Top in woven fabric with wrapover straps at the front that tie at the back of the neck, an open back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and a flared lower section that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Top in woven fabric with wrapover straps at the front that tie at the back of the neck, an open back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and a flared lower section that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Satin top with a shimmering pattern. Opening at the front with narrow ties at the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication. Seam at the waist, concealed elastication at the back and a flared peplum.
Fitted lace body with a V-neck, long sleeves and a seam at the hips, below which is a jersey section with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front and back.

Dungaree dress and bodysuit in organic cotton. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Soft brushed inside. Short-sleeved body in patterned jersey with an embroidered lace trim around the neckline and sleeves, and press-studs at the shoulder and crotch.
Patterned tights with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-patterned jersey containing metal threads with a ribbed trim around the neckline and long sleeves.
Long, pleated dress in satin with a sheen. Draped, wrapover top section, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam under the bust and flared skirt. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Seven pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and one pair with a pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 2.5 cm.
